text: Baluna, â€˜ami ki allahake chere an'yake raba khumjaba? Athaca tini'i saba kichura raba. â€™Pratyeke nija nija krtakarmera jan'ya dayi ebam ke'u an'ya karo bhara grahana karabe na. Tarapara tomadera pratyabartana tomadera rabera dike'i, atahpara ye bisaye tomara matabheda karate, ta tini tomaderake abahita karabena
